info.title: Management API
info.description: Management API for Open Banking Connector Web App

BankProfileEnum.description:
Banks for which bank profiles have been created. Called BankProfileEnum to avoid confusion with the associated
class BankProfile.

SoftwareStatementId.description:
ID of software statement to use for registration. The ID must
correspond to a previously-added software statement.

DefaultFragmentRedirectUri.description:
Default fragment redirect URI to use for this registration. This URI must
be included in the redirect URIs used for this registration (these are specified by RedirectUris and if that is
null default to those specified in the software statement in software statement profile
SoftwareStatementProfileId).
If null, the default fragment redirect URI specified in the software statement profile
will be used.

DefaultQueryRedirectUri.description:
Default query redirect URI to use for this registration. This URI must
be included in the redirect URIs used for this registration (these are specified by RedirectUris and if that is
null default to those specified in the software statement in software statement profile
SoftwareStatementProfileId).
If null, the default query redirect URI specified in the software statement profile
will be used.

RedirectUris.description:
Redirect URIs to use for this registration. Must be a subset of those specified in
the software statement in software statement profile SoftwareStatementProfileId.
If null, redirect URIs specified in the software statement will be used.

ExternalApiId.description:
External (bank) API ID, i.e. ID of OAuth2 client at bank. This should be unique between objects created at the
same bank but we do not assume global uniqueness between objects created at multiple banks.
Use this to supply information about a previously-created external API (bank) registration (OAuth2 client) created
at the bank either
via API or the bank's developer portal.
When non-null, this external registration will re-used and Dynamic Client Registration (DCR) will not be performed.

ExternalApiSecret.description:
External (bank) API secret. Present to allow use of legacy token auth method "client_secret_basic" in sandboxes
etc. Only relevant/used when FinnovationLabs.OpenBanking.Library.Connector.Models.Public.Management.Request.BankRegistration.ExternalApiId is non-null.

RegistrationAccessToken.description:
External (bank) API registration access token. Sometimes used to support registration adjustments etc. Only
relevant/used when FinnovationLabs.OpenBanking.Library.Connector.Models.Public.Management.Request.BankRegistration.ExternalApiId is non-null.

UseSimulatedBank.description: Use simulated bank (only supported for some bank profiles).

Reference.description:
Optional reference for linking object to something else - e.g. a user ID in the client
application. This field is not used by Open Banking Connector.

CreatedBy.description:
Optional "created by" string in local database. Similar to "modified by" for mutable fields in local database, this
field
can be used to denote authorship.

SoftwareStatementId.description:
ID of software statement to use for registration. The ID must
correspond to a previously-added software statement.

JwksUri.description: JWK Set URI (normally supplied from OpenID Configuration)

RegistrationEndpoint.description: Registration endpoint (normally supplied from OpenID Configuration)

TokenEndpoint.description: Token endpoint (normally supplied from OpenID Configuration)

AuthorizationEndpoint.description: Authorization endpoint (normally supplied from OpenID Configuration)

DefaultFragmentRedirectUri.description:
Default fragment redirect URI to use for this registration. This URI must
be included in the redirect URIs used for this registration (these are specified by RedirectUris and if that is
null default to those specified in the software statement in software statement profile
SoftwareStatementProfileId).
If null, the default fragment redirect URI specified in the software statement profile
will be used.

RedirectUris.description:
Redirect URIs to use for this registration. Must be a subset of those specified in
the software statement in software statement profile SoftwareStatementProfileId.
If null, redirect URIs specified in the software statement will be used.

UseSimulatedBank.description: Use simulated bank (only supported for some bank profiles).

Id.description: Unique Open Banking Connector ID (used in local database).

field
can be used to denote authorship.

Reference.description:
Optional reference for linking object to something else - e.g. a user ID in the client
application. This field is not used by Open Banking Connector.

Warnings.description: Optional list of warning messages from Open Banking Connector.

EncryptionKeyDescriptionResponse.description: Response to EncryptionKeyDescription read and create requests.

iss.description:
Gets or sets unique identifier for the TPP. Implemented as Base62
encoded GUID

iat.description:
Gets or sets the time at which the request was issued by the TPP
expressed as seconds since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z as measured in UTC

exp.description:
Gets or sets the time at which the request expires expressed as
seconds since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z as measured in UTC

aud.description:
Gets or sets the audience for the request. This should be the
unique identifier
for the ASPSP issued by the issuer of the software statement.
Implemented as Base62 encoded GUID

jti.description: Gets or sets unique identifier for the JWT implemented as UUID v4

client_id.description: Gets or sets oAuth 2.0 client identifier string

client_secret.description: Gets or sets oAuth 2.0 client secret string

registration_access_token.description: Optional parameter from OpenID DCR spec

registration_client_uri.description: Optional parameter from OpenID DCR spec

subject_type.description: Optional parameter from OpenID DCR spec

client_id_issued_at.description:
Gets or sets time at which the client identifier was issued
expressed as seconds since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z as measured in UTC

client_secret_expires_at.description:
Gets or sets time at which the client secret will expire expressed
as seconds since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z as measured in UTC. Set to 0
if does not expire

backchannel_client_notification_endpoint.description:
Gets or sets as defined in CIBA - Registration and Discovery
Metadata.  This value MUST be specified iff the grant_types
includes  urn:openid:params:grant-type:ciba and
backchannel_token_delivery_mode is not poll.  This must be a valid
HTTPS URL

backchannel_user_code_parameter_supporte.description:
Gets or sets as defined in CIBA - Registration and Discovery
Metadata.  This value MUST be specified only if the grant_types
includes  urn:openid:params:grant-type:ciba.  If specified, it MUST
be set to false.

AssociatedKeyId.description: Key ID of associated key (from UK Open Banking Directory) as string.

Certificate.description:
OB Seal (signing) certificate (X.509) as "stringified" PEM file with escaped newline characters ("
") and
"CERTIFICATE"
label.
Example: "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
ABC
-----END CERTIFICATE-----
"

RegistrationScopeEnum.description:
Registration scope used when creating a bank client.
Set of FinnovationLabs.OpenBanking.Library.Connector.Models.Public.Management.RegistrationScopeElementEnum.

OrganisationId.description: Organisation ID from UK Open Banking directory as string.

SoftwareId.description: Software statement ID from UK Open Banking directory as string.

SandboxEnvironment.description:
When true, denotes software statement is defined in UK OB directory sandbox (not production) environment. Defaults
to false.

DefaultObWacCertificateId.description: ID of default ObWacCertificate to use for mutual TLS with this software statement.

DefaultObSealCertificateId.description: ID of default ObSealCertificate to use for signing JWTs etc with this software statement.

DefaultQueryRedirectUrl.description: Default redirect URL for consent authorisation when OAuth2 response_mode = query.

DefaultFragmentRedirectUrl.description: Default redirect URL for consent authorisation when OAuth2 response_mode = fragment.
